data.name: Empires Apart - Mongol Civilization Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Golden Horde rides into battle! Play as the unstoppable Mongols – an aggressive nomadic civilization that focuses solely on cavalry.

Mongol buildings can be dismantled at any moment and moved, or reassembled into different buildings. Deadly cavalry archers can be employed for quick hit and run attacks. Bloodlust makes units become stronger the more kills they gather. The Yam system provides a movement speed bonus to allied mounted units. Priests can use Divination to grant allied units the power to dodge incoming attacks. Settlers can construct tents or transform into siege weapons or even transport ships.

• Play as the Mongols in every Singleplayer and Multiplayer mode.
• Unique Bloodlust, Settler and Divination mechanics.
• 6 unique Challenges.
• 8 buildings, 12 units.
• 2 heroes: Gengis Khan and Khubilai Khan.

data.short_description: The Golden Horde rides into battle! Play as the unstoppable Mongols – an aggressive nomadic civilization that focuses solely on cavalry.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, German, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.7ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.4ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
